post.content:
Subject: SQL Server 7.0 DBA

Desc.: Working with the application development team, you will be responsible for Database Administration of SQL Server 7.0 databases.
Must Have Skills:
?SQL Server 7.0 Database Administration (3+ years)
?Excellent communication skills
?Ability to work independently

Please send your resume in strict confidence to,
Jeet Singh
Lintex Computer Group Inc.                www.lintexgroup.com
tel. 416-663-0900 ext.229                   fax. 416-663-7315
ka98gh@Lintexgroup.com
I.T. People Placing I.T. People
